channel.title: Nigeria on Becky's Curriculum Vitae
channel.description: Recent content in Nigeria on Becky's Curriculum Vitae

item.title: Semantics of u̱t-Ma'in noun classes
item.description: Citeable as: Paterson, Rebecca D. 2012. Semantics of U̱t-Ma’in noun classes. In Roger Blench and Stuart McGill (eds.). Advances in minority language research in Nigeria, volume 1, 239-272. Köln: Rüdiger Köppe. Comments:

item.title: Pipero Research
item.description: Working alongside local speakers of Pipero to develop a writing system and language materials.

item.title: u̱t-Ma'in noun research
item.description: Complex morphology and agreement patterns within the NP and beyond.

item.title: The noun class system of U̱t-Ma'in, a West Kainji language of Northwestern Nigeria
item.description: Citeable as: Smith, Rebecca. D. 2007. The noun class system of U̱t-Ma’in, a West Kainji language of Northwestern Nigeria. MA thesis, University of North Dakota. Available online: http://arts-sciences.und.edu/summer-institute-of-linguistics/theses/2007-smith-rebecca-d.cfm Comments:
